Text:
every claim in those liner notes, except "the rocket ship shape of churces," is correct, or at least a common philosophical conundrum.

yeah, he really must have been totally out there insane.

God I havent heard tis since 1073.

Thanx Test

Tone

*****
Great upload, any chance of an upload of his second and only other album Glass Top Coffin?

I remember a friend had this album in the UK when I lived there in the early 70's.   Amazing fold out cover of a cathedral come rocketship.  I had a tape copy of side one of the album and played it for years, it was very listnenable and probably still is.  The track "And The Whole World..." was particularly memorable.  Thanks a bunch for seeding this.  I never thought that I would hear this again.  :)
